name: Toadal War: Top of the Hops
name_original: Toadal War: Top of the Hops
description:
Toadal War: Top of the Hops

A multiplayer rhythm game in which each player is a musical toad. Press a button to sing when the wave hits you. If you miss, you're eliminated!

A very accesssible game with one button controls, it's perfect for large groups, parties or other events where controllers are being passed around.

This game was made in 8 hours for the 2016 Rezzed Game Jam sponsored by Creative Assembly. The theme of the jam was "flux" and you can see us talking about the project here: YouTube

Supports keyboard controls and up to 6 joypads.

Follow @SofaSquadron on twitter!
